component.name: Goverlay
component.summary: Easily configure MangoHud, vkBasalt and OptiScaler

description.p: Goverlay is an easy graphical interface to configure MangoHud, vkBasalt, and OptiScaler. Goverlay helps Linux gamers get the most out of their systems by providing an easy-to-use graphical interface to configure MangoHud, vkBasalt, and OptiScaler. Whether you're looking for performance monitoring, visual enhancements, or smarter upscaling, Goverlay makes everything accessible in just a few clicks.

screenshot.caption: Performance section to configure fps,frame time..
Metrics section to configure CPU and GPU stats.
Extra goodies like distro info, wine version..

ul.li: Added Proton environment variable configuration (HDR, Wayland, Proton Logs, SDL Input)
Added GameMode integration for MangoHud, vkBasalt, and OptiScaler launch commands
Embedded fgmod scripts directly into GOverlay binary
Added launch command display when saving configurations
Added dynamic path detection for native and Flatpak environments
Added Dune Awakening executable path resolution support
Preserve fgmod, fgmod-remover.sh, and fgmod-uninstaller.sh during OptiScaler updates
Added support for patched version tags (e.g., 0.7.9-2, edge-0.9.8.0106-2)
Added DXIL_SPIRV_CONFIG workaround option for RDNA3 GPUs
Disable emufp8 option automatically when using FSR 4.0.2 (INT8)
Properly disable controls when OptiScaler is not installed
Fixed vkBasalt toggleKey not saving selected combobox value
Improved GPU detection to include Display controllers
Fixed Flatpak sandbox path and fgmod script existence checks
Fixed OptiScaler tab check bug and enabled commands display without fgmod
Removed pci_dev from MangoHud config (only gpu_list is used now)
Replaced commandLabel with commandEdit and excluded from theming
UI cleanup: reset active tab and removed hardcoded color properties
